item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: We at Kozymacro are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains our data processing practices and your options regarding the ways in which your personal data is used and is provided by Kozymacro, a Turkey company. If you have requests concerning your personal information or any questions please contact us kozymacro@gmail.com. If you have objections to the Privacy Policy, you should immediately discontinue use of the Web site and the Services offered by us.
